query:
ALTER TABLE chat_messages 
ADD COLUMN messageType ENUM('text', 'audio', 'image', 'video', 'file', 'link') DEFAULT 'text' NOT NULL AFTER senderType,
ADD COLUMN mediaUrl TEXT NULL AFTER message,
ADD COLUMN mediaName VARCHAR(255) NULL AFTER mediaUrl,
ADD COLUMN mediaMimeType VARCHAR(100) NULL AFTER mediaName,
ADD COLUMN mediaSize INT NULL AFTER mediaMimeType,
ADD COLUMN mediaDuration INT NULL AFTER mediaSize,
ADD COLUMN audioTranscription TEXT NULL AFTER mediaDuration,
ADD COLUMN linkPreviewTitle VARCHAR(255) NULL AFTER audioTranscription,
ADD COLUMN linkPreviewDescription TEXT NULL AFTER linkPreviewTitle,
ADD COLUMN linkPreviewImage TEXT NULL AFTER linkPreviewDescription,
ADD COLUMN linkPreviewUrl TEXT NULL AFTER linkPreviewImage,
ADD COLUMN isEdited BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE AFTER linkPreviewUrl,
ADD COLUMN editedAt TIMESTAMP NULL AFTER isEdited,
ADD COLUMN originalMessage TEXT NULL AFTER editedAt,
ADD COLUMN deletedForSender BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE AFTER originalMessage,
ADD COLUMN deletedForAll BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE AFTER deletedForSender,
ADD COLUMN deletedAt TIMESTAMP NULL AFTER deletedForAll;
